üì∞ Blog/News SSG Demo

CACHED SSG

Real Business Scenario: News/blog site with content that updates occasionally. Content is pre-generated and cached for lightning-fast delivery, then regenerated every 60 seconds.

üìä Check your terminal console - logs only appear during generation, not cached hits!

üîç SSG/ISR Verification Steps:

  1. Speed Test: Refresh this page multiple times quickly - notice how fast it loads (served from cache).
  2. Page ID Test: The Page ID stays the same for 60 seconds (proving cache), then changes.
  3. Console Check: Terminal logs only appear during generation, not cached requests.
  4. Network Tab: DevTools shows no API requests for cached pages.
  5. Wait Test: Wait 60+ seconds, refresh - new Page ID appears (regenerated).

üíº Business Benefits:

  • ‚úì Lightning Fast: 50-200ms load times (served from CDN cache)
  • ‚úì 90% Cost Reduction: Minimal server processing needed
  • ‚úì Perfect SEO: Pre-rendered HTML indexed immediately
  • ‚úì Unlimited Scale: Handle millions of visitors with ease
  • ‚úì Fresh Content: Regenerates automatically every 60 seconds
  • ~ Periodic Updates: Content may be up to 60 seconds old

üìä Real Console Output (Check Terminal):

// You'll see output like this ONLY during generation:
üì∞ SSG/ISR: Blog content generated at 2026-02-22T10:03:35.175Z
üì∞ SSG/ISR: API response time: 266ms
üì∞ SSG/ISR: Content cached for 60 seconds - super fast subsequent loads!
üìä SSG/ISR: Analytics data cached and generated
üöÄ SSG/ISR: Starting page generation at 2026-02-22T10:03:35.175Z
üöÄ SSG/ISR: This content will be CACHED for 60 seconds
üöÄ SSG/ISR: Next 60 requests will be served from CACHE (lightning fast!)
// For cached requests: NO logs = served from cache!

üéØ Manager Demo Script:

1. Speed Demo: "Refresh this page 10 times quickly - notice how fast it loads? That's cache serving at CDN speed."

2. Console Evidence: "Look at the terminal - no logs during cached requests. The server isn't even touched for most visitors!"

3. Cost Savings: "This page costs us almost nothing to serve. We can handle 100x more traffic without adding servers."

4. SEO Advantage: "Content is pre-rendered and cached globally. Search engines love this - instant indexing."

5. Smart Updates: "Content regenerates every 60 seconds automatically. Fresh enough for news, fast enough for scale."

6. Scale Demo: "This architecture can handle Super Bowl traffic spikes without breaking a sweat."
